user.bio: Im just your typical aussie/fijian girl who loves trying diffrent beers and ciders, from not only in my area but worldwi
I love beer. My aim is to taste and review as many different beer from around the world. 1 beer at a time.

items.badge_description: Celebrate women and non-binary individuals in craft beer! Every year the Pink Boots Society (PBS) hosts Collaboration Brew Day where teams come together to brew a collab beer that supports the PBS mission to support, inspire, and encourage the professional development of women and non-binary people in the industry. Learn more

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 65 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 14!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 60 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 13! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Milkshake IPAs and Pale Ales are one of the trendiest styles right now. Who knew fruit, lactose, and hops would blend so well together?  You’ve checked-in to 5 different Milkshake style IPA’s or Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: Feeling like this one lacks an identity. Not a straight IPA, not hazy, not as fruity or as creamy as expected of a ‘peaches and oat cream’ beer.

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 5 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 2. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 10 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 3! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 15 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 260 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 53!

items.checkin_comment: From Friday. Refreshing. Otherwise nothing to write home about.

I like beer.
When I was 27, I realized there are many attractive craft beers in the world.  Then life is all craft beer and skittles.
Follow me on Instagram @beero_clock
